greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of set partitions of [n] with alternating block size parities.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..592
maple: b:= proc(n, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(
mathematica: b[n_, t_] := b[n, t] = If[n==0, 1, Sum[If[OddQ[i+t], b[n-i, 1-t] * Binomial[n-1, i-1], 0], {i, 1, n}]]; a[n_] := If[n==0, 1, b[n, 0] + b[n, 1]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 35}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 27 2017, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 05 2016
